thread.title: Barbour Jr. pleads not guilty on assault, awaits jury trial next year
thread.title_full: Barbour Jr. pleads not guilty on assault, awaits jury trial next year

author: Frank Corder
title: Barbour Jr. pleads not guilty on assault, awaits jury trial next year
text: Barbour pleads not guilty to felony assault WASHINGTON — Haley Reeves Barbour Jr., youngest son of former Mississippi Gov. Haley Barbour, pleaded not guilty Thursday to felony assault for allegedly hitting a man at a bar in Washington earlier this year. The charge against Barbour was upgraded from a misdemeanor to a felony in September. He is scheduled to stand trial on April 19 next year. “Mr. Barbour looks forward to trial by a jury of his peers," said Marlon Griffith, Barbour's Washington-based attorney. ClarionLedger Posted October 15, 2015 - 10:23 pm YallPolitics.Com now uses Facebook for comments. Log into Facebook to comment here.
